name: I Am Promise
description:
"I Am Promise" is a very short browser-based visual novel in which you need to turn off a robot. A typical playthrough will take about 5 minutes or so. 

This is my entry for the O2A2 Visual Novel Jam. To comply with the jam rules, it uses:

  • One image
  • One ambient soundtrack
  • 997 words

There are two possible endings.

The audio may have a gap on mobile browsers; feel free to mute it, as it's just there for ambience.

Enjoy.

Credits

Writing and programming by Alan Dove

Image and sound modified from public  NASA/JPL-Caltech sources

Game powered by Ink, the narrative scripting language
